title: Admin dashboard overview reimagined
scope: Redesign admin overview to surface core model counts and queue status
Add linked overview cards for users, groups, blog posts, tenant intakes, attorney intakes, and worker queue
Include a compact status strip for approvals/intakes/queue depth
acceptance_criteria: Admin overview shows counts for users, groups, blog posts, tenant intakes, attorney intakes, and queue depth
Each overview card links to its respective admin configuration view/tab
Overview includes a brief worker queue snapshot with latest job status
Non-admin roles see only data they are permitted to access
risk_notes: New stats calls may surface backend errors if endpoints are missing or auth-scoped
UI may feel crowded without thoughtful layout and hierarchy
rollback_plan: Revert the overview component changes to restore the previous dashboard layout
